name: Shellrazer
description:
GET ON YOUR GIANT WARRIOR TURTLE, PUT SOME WEAPONS IN YOUR BELT AND START SHOOTING!

You are a Cowboy Klang Clan Turtle and you must guide your Turtle Warrior through three new worlds. Travel across the Goblin Realms to help your turtle find true love. Walk through the Wild Yeti to rescue your pup. Walk through Buglian hives to rescue a downed ally and stop the Bugs from stealing their technology.

Walk through snowy peaks, rotten swamps and hot deserts as you rescue different champions to fight for your cause. Curtis the Mage. Chuckles the Dragon and Gunnar Gunnarson are just a few of the heroes who will lend their strength in your adventure.

Highlights:

Critically acclaimed and among the best-selling shooters!

3 Different Worlds and over 100 levels to conquer.

Rescue and raise 16 different champions.

Over 100 different enemies to fight.

Hours and hours of gameplay.

Multi-tap controls for mind-blowing combos.

Critics love Shellrazer:

Among the 5 best games during 2012 - Canadian Video Game Awards

4.5/5 - The App Shack

4.5/5 - Gamezebo

4.9/5 - The Apple Tree

4.5/5 - Chuknum.com

Among the 50 best Games of 2012 - Modojo.com
